query:
SELECT
                    c.id,
                    c.name,
                    c.cover
                FROM
                    collage c
                WHERE
                    (c.name ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%')
                ORDER BY
                    CASE
                        -- Exact Match: Highest priority
                        WHEN c.name = $1 THEN 1
                        -- Starts With Match (Prefix): Second highest priority
                        WHEN c.name ILIKE $1 || '%' THEN 2
                        -- Anywhere Match: Lowest priority (or all remaining)
                        ELSE 3
                    END
                LIMIT $2
